title: a lot of bugs but no solutions
body: i am playing lol for over 2 years now. The game is ok not good not bad but there are a lot of problems. Before the game started i got no connection - lost connection which is not true. I have internet connection but the game is telling me that i have not i try to connect again but it is not letting me. For over these 2 years i never got banned  and i dont want to get a ban over something i have no contol over. This is not something new because i had this problem a lot of times not only me but a lot of my friends.  I have honor 5 dont want to lose that not that is something big or get banned but someone need to fix this. I dont even want to talk about the game bugs. Thank you for taking your time to read this even if its very long.

replies.body: It might be a good time to take a step back and see if we could troubleshoot your network settings to get a bit of a stronger connection with our servers so that this doesn't happen so often. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and work through those steps, but do make sure to pay extra attention to firewalls, port forwarding, and how to flush your dns.
